original_title: Beats of the Heart: The Two Faces of Thailand A Musical Portrait
overview: Even today, at the king of Thailands birthday celebrations, massed bands play His Majestyâ€™s own compositions, whilst the King plays his clarinet in the royal recording studio. But the musical underbelly of the country had never been exposed before this film, which - by contrast - captures the cabarets and boxing rings of Thailand, and the true street-level music.
title: Beats of the Heart: The Two Faces of Thailand A Musical Portrait
